description: Succulent spiced chicken breast with juicy grilled pineapple is the perfect flavour combo. There's lots to love about this quick and easy barbecue recipe.
name: Huli Huli Chicken With Grilled Pineapple Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pineapple, cut into thick wedges, cored

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Combine pineapple juice, ginger, garlic, sauces, vinegar and sugar in a large bowl. Reserve half of the marinade in a small bowl. Add chicken to marinade in large bowl and turn to coat.
Grill chicken for 20 minutes, turning and brushing with reserved marinade every 3 minutes, or until cooked through. Grill pineapple for 10 minutes on each side or until charred.
Place chicken and pineapple on a platter. Scatter over onion and serve with lime cheeks.
